author: Author
loginSubtitle: Log in to your account to use all features
aboutText: For detailed information about our publishing house and the books we publish.
aboutParagraph1: Gutenberg Publishing House is not just a publisher, but a bridge of innovation and knowledge. We are a creative publishing house that translates new, contemporary works of world science into the Uzbek language and delivers them to readers in the form of popular science literature.
aboutParagraph2: The library's usual idea is that instead of buying individual books, you can access the entire catalog. We don't sell books and force you to download them, but we give them to you for reading without restrictions and on various devices. A subscription is enough.
aboutParagraph3: In the usual sense, e-books have so far been similar to paper books: these are separate files that need to be downloaded and stored somewhere, then thrown to the reader-reader, and if you have several reading devices, you will have to store a separate copy in each of your libraries. If you not only read books, but also save bookmarks and notes, you often have to manually synchronize all this.
aboutParagraph4: For avid readers and with pleasure, we decided to turn MyBook into a library club, by joining which you can read not only the books you have, but also publications from our extensive catalog.
aboutMetaDescription: Gutenberg Publishing House is not just a publisher, but a bridge of innovation and knowledge. We are a creative publishing house that translates new, contemporary works of world science into the Uzbek language and delivers them to readers in the form of popular science literature.

aboutPublisherHeading: What kind of publisher is Gutenberg Publishing House?
aboutPublisherDescription: Five centuries ago, Gutenberg's invention led to the popularization of books and the beginning of a new Renaissance era. We have set the same grand goal for ourselves.
ourGoalText: We aim to contribute to a new intellectual awakening by conveying the most progressive ideas of our time in the Uzbek language.
